mapper.select: SELECT concat('[',a.Code,'] ',a.Name) AS name, a.Id as id,true as open,a.ParentId FROM sys_menu a WHERE Enable = 1 AND ( a.ParentId IS NULL OR a.ParentId = 0 )
SELECT concat('[',a.Code,'] ',a.Name) AS name, a.Id as id,true as open FROM sys_role a WHERE Enable = 1 ORDER BY OrderNum,substring(a.Code,1,3)
